version_description: Optimized for iOS 7 Game Controller
Optimized for iOS 7 Game Controller

V1.92

- slow down the cube colours cycle for sensitive eyes

v1.91

- Japanese version available (see in Options)

bug fix:
- AutoSync of your game progress among devices with Game Center is working again!
- fix the time for each rank in bonus level 16

v1.90

- Optimized for the iPad Retina display
- One new level, made by Zias, a 7 years old kid! It's the level 16 of the bonus pack. Thank you Zias & Two Tribes.

v2.00

The game now supports both portrait and landscape orientations on iPhone, iPod, and iPad. To make it work, we removed the accelerometer control option, but this version is really great to play and we hope you will like it!

v2.00

The game now supports both portrait and landscape orientations on iPhone, iPod, and iPad. To make it work, we removed the accelerometer control option, but this version is really great to play and we hope you will like it!

Minor bug fix
Minor bug fix

- New 3D engine running at 60 FPS!
- Progress sync between your devices with Game Center
- Optimized for Retina and iPad 2 (4xMSAA)
- Optimized for 1st and 2nd gen devices
- New option to play against your ghost

Bug fix:
- Achievement Super x3 unlockable with Super Plus x3
- Levels Speedrun, Metro and Peripherique are easier
- minor bug fixes
